content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Good to meet you, Juan. Thank you for your interest in the apartment. Can you please tell me what kind of rental price you are willing to pay?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want the lowest possible price. Can you tell me the original rental price of the apartment?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Of course, Juan. The original rental price of the apartment was 800 Euros per month. However, I am willing to negotiate on the price. What is your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to pay 600 Euro per month. Is that possible?
Please let me know the details of the apartment.
What is the location?
How many bedrooms?
How many bathrooms?
Is it furnished or unfurnished?
Do you have any additional fees or charges?
What is the lease term?
What happens if I need to terminate the lease early?
What is the security deposit?
How much is the monthly utilities cost?
Can I ask for a short term rental?
Can I have pets?
Are there any parking spaces?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Juan. The apartment is located in the heart of Mannheim, a thriving city with a lot to offer. It has two bedrooms and one bathroom. The apartment is unfurnished, but you can easily personalize it to your taste. There are no additional fees or charges. The lease term is for one year, but we are open to discussing a longer term. If you need to terminate the lease early, you will have to pay a penalty fee. The security deposit is 200 Euros, which will be returned to you at the end of the lease term, provided that there are no damages or unpaid rent. The monthly utilities cost is around 100 Euros. Yes, you can ask for a short term rental, but the minimum rental period is three months. Unfortunately, pets are not allowed in the apartment. There are no parking spaces included in the rental price, but you can park your car on the street near the apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
